channel.title: Contact-Tracing on Edd Mann
channel.description: Recent content in Contact-Tracing on Edd Mann

item.title: Creating a Contact Tracing Scanner using Swift for macOS
item.description: Following on from my previous experiment which highlighted what an Exposure Notification-enabled device actually emits using Web Bluetooth, I decided to explore how I could do the same using Swift and Interface Builder for macOS.

item.title: Creating a Contact Tracing Scanner using Web Bluetooth
item.description: I have recently been looking at the Contact Tracing specifications that Apple and Google released earlier this year in aid of the fight against COVID-19. Looking through these documents allowed me to grasp how the system was put together. It also helped ease concerns that family members had regarding how privacy-conscious the Exposure Notification system is.
